title: Infinite Painter v3.0.2
description:
Infinite Painter goes far beyond other raster-based graphics applications, bringing you fresh, innovative features that canÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t be found anywhere else:

- 100+ brushes separated into categories
- Blend and mix colors
- Pressure-sensitivity and stylus support
- Trace and rub images
- Unlimited layers
- Project-playback from start to finish
- High-definition paintings (2048 x 2048)
- Import images from your camera, your gallery, or from the web
- Five types of symmetry - horizontal, vertical, angular, radial, and kaleidoscopic
- A pull out protractor to quickly create straight lines or circles
- Search millions of colors via ColourLovers.com
- Five drawing modes - normal, pen, rectangle, ellipse, and line
- Rotate and flip the canvas
- Fluid interface
- Reference images
- Use any brush as a soft eraser
- Export images as JPEG, PNG, or PSD
- Import from Infinite Design
- JaJa Stylus and Pressure Pen Support
- NVIDIA DirectStylus support

What's New:

-changed icon
-increased JPEG quality for free version
-added prompt for merge layer down
-Fixed fit to full screen and centering bug
-removed draw cursor
-added exit without saving
-fixed disappearing brush preview
-updated translations
-fixed opacity for marker and pen
-fixed taper length for ink and marker
-added speed pressure for finger
-fixed disappearing layers bug
-added layer opacity in playback
+fixed eraser not working for vector brushes
+uniform spread for faster brushes
